name: Airpod Pro Maxes
desc: A perfect balance of exhilarating high-fidelity audio and the effortless magic of AirPods. The ultimate personal listening experience is here.

name: Beats Solo3
desc: Wireless is your perfect everyday headphone. Get the most out of your music with award winning sound and up to 40 hours of battery life.

desc: Collapsible stereophone combines high-quality sound reproduction with a unique design for the ultimate in convenience and comfort.

desc: Arctis 3 brings pure performance and style, featuring SteelSeries 7.1 Surround Sound. The best wired headset for PC, PS4, Xbox One, Switch and more.

desc: HyperX Cloud II features a newly designed USB sound card audio control box that amplifies audio and voice for an optimal Hi Fi gaming experience

name: Bose Quietcomfort
desc: True wireless QuietComfort earbuds from Bose offer adjustable noise cancelling, lifelike audio, and a secure, comfortable fit.

name: Razer Kraken X
desc: The ultra-light Razer Kraken X is a multi-platform gaming headset built with superior comfort, Extended durability and crystal-clear sound.

name: Sony wh- 1000xm5
desc: The WH-1000XM5 headphones rewrite the rules for distraction-free listening. 2 processors control 8 microphones for unprecedented noise cancellation and exceptional call quality. With a newly developed driver, DSEE Extreme and Hi-Res audio support the WH-1000XM5 headphones provide awe-inspiring audio quality.

name: JBL Tune 510BT
desc: The JBL Tune 510BT headphones wirelessly stream powerful JBL Pure Bass sound for up to 40 hours. Grab them and fill your day with music!

name: Marshall Major IV
desc: The iconic headphones from Marshall with 80+ solid hours of wireless playtime, wireless charging and a new, improved ergonomic design.

desc: The stylish Bang & Olufsen Beoplay EQ earphones deliver relatively accurate true wireless audio and solid noise cancellation
